name: Stranded (itch) (mkhoi)
description:
The zombie apocalypse has come.

Your car ran out of gas near a small town infested with a lot of zombies. You gotta get in there and try to find enough fuel for your car and escape. Oh! You also have a turret, it is your best friend here in the apocalypse, though you can't move while using it. The town is fairly large so remember to go explore around a bit.

There are also medkits and ammo boxes around the town so remember to check on those if you are low on health and ammo for your turret.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • P to deploy/undeploy turret
  • O to control turret
  • A and D to aim turret (while controlling it)
  • L to shoot turret

Also, you have to be close enough to the turret to be able to do anything with it.

Made for the Nokia Game Jam 3.

I'm very sorry for the hard to read text on the game. I tried to make it not anti-aliased but it's not working.
